alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 12:53PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Laramie County through 130 PM MDT... At 1253 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Frontier Park, or over Cheyenne, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cheyenne, South Greeley, Hillsdale, Ranchettes, Warren AFB, Frontier Park, North Cheyenne, Warren Af Base, Fox Farm-College and South Greeley High. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 6 and 17. Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 356 and 383. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills
